definition: Buddhist salutation or expression of faith (loanword from Sanskrit)/Taiwan pr. [na2 mo2]

sentences.english: Why do some people maintain that you have to add the two syllable "ná mó"?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有人说“南无”两个字一定要加上？

definition: Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
one of the many names of Buddha
Amitabha, the Buddha of the Western Paradise/abbr. for 阿彌陀佛|阿弥陀佛/Mituo or Mito township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
pinyin: Da4 yuan4 Di4 zang4 Pu2 sa4

definition: World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
Mahasthamaprapta Bodhisattva, the Great Strength Bodhisattva
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
pinyin: Wen2 shu1 shi1 li4 Pu2 sa4
